# isEqual(to:)

**Instance Method**

Indicates whether the receiver has the same name and data as the specified time zone.

## Declaration

```swift
func isEqual(to aTimeZone: TimeZone) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **aTimeZone**: The time zone to compare with the receiver.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if `aTimeZone` and the receiver have the same name and data, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isEqual(to:)
